thread.title: Grandmother fleeced out of £1200 by Italian lover she met on Facebook
thread.title_full: Grandmother fleeced out of £1200 by Italian lover she met on Facebook

title: Grandmother fleeced out of £1200 by Italian lover she met on Facebook
text:
Grandmother fleeced out of £1,200 by 'Italian lover' she met on Facebook 
Daily Mail Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Sumner Redstone, 92, 'kicks out former girlfriend, 51, just weeks after breaking up with live-in lover, 44, as billionaire media mogul reunites with his estranged family' 
...
